text: The 7th Street/Metro Center station is a light rail and rapid transit station located in Downtown Los Angeles. This station serves two rapid transit lines (B & D) and two light rail lines (A & E), all belonging to the Los Angeles Metro Rail. The station was built by the Southern California Rapid Transit District and opened on February 15, 1991. The station connects to the Metro Busway (J) and also has direct entry to a shopping center called The Bloc. ==References== Category:Transport in California
title: 7th Street/Metro Center station
